text: Marinko Rokvić (; 27 January 1954 – 6 November 2021) was a Bosnian Serb folk singer. His debut album, titled Ruža, was released in 1981 under PGP-RTB. Over the years he became one of the most popular Serbian folk singers. His 1983 release, Da volim drugu ne mogu, was sold in around 600,000 copies. Rokvić died from pancreatic cancer in Belgrade, Serbia on 6 November 2021, aged 67. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina entertainers Category:Serbian singers Category:Folk singers Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Marinko Rokvić
